logic: Vendor will choose any one from the options and chosen option will be visible and mandatory: 1. Cancelled Cheque (India Domestic) 2. Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International) 3. Cancelled Cheque (India Import and International) 4. SWIFT Image (India Import and International) 5. Bank Statement/Confirmation (India Import and International) Vendor will choose and upload any one option

If process type is India and Please choose the option is choose as Cancelled Cheque then it is visible and mandatory. The upload limit should be up to 15 Mb. Perform the Bank OCR and get IFSC code and Account Number
If Please the option is chosen as Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International)then it is visible and mandatory. The upload limit should be up to 15 Mb.

field_name: Please enter IFSC and Account Number manually
logic: Show this fields if passbook front page (India Domestic and International) is selected

Non editable if cancelled cheque is selected. Editable for other option. Visible and mandatory for Cancelled Cheque (India Domestic) 2. Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International). Otherwise invisible and non-mandatory. Auto-derived from OCR in case of cheque, manual entry in case of other options. Perform IFSC code verification

Non editable if cancelled cheque is selected. Editable for other option. Visible and mandatory for Cancelled Cheque (India Domestic) 2. Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International). Otherwise invisible and non-mandatory. Auto-derived from OCR in case of cheque, manual entry in case of other options ,Perform Bank account verification
India (By default) for process type India-Domestic. Vendor can choose from dropdown for other process types.
